name: @graphprotocol/graph-ts
description: TypeScript/AssemblyScript library for writing subgraph mappings for The Graph

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push origin master && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push origin master && git push --tags
scripts.release:alpha:minor: npm version preminor --preid alpha && npm publish --tag alpha && git push origin master && git push --tags
scripts.release:alpha:prerelease: npm version prerelease --preid alpha && npm publish --tag alpha && git push origin master && git push --tags
